abstract: New York Police Dept is stepping up effort to combat sex crimes in subway as reports of inappropriate groping and conduct escalate; increasingly crowded subway system provides easy cover for sexual predators, while crimes are often unreported by victims who are confused, embarrassed or hurrying to work; undercover officers and photos of perpetrators captured on victims' cellphones are among tools being used by department.
lead_paragraph: The New York police are training more female officers, riding trains in street clothes and encouraging riders to report abuse.

headline.main: Renewed Efforts to Stop Subway Sex Crimes
headline.print_headline: Push to Stop Sex Crimes in Subway as Reports Rise

snippet: The New York police are training more female officers, riding trains in street clothes and encouraging riders to report abuse.
